headline: Ralph Lauren (RL) Upgraded to Buy: Here's What You Should Know
summary: Ralph Lauren (RL) has been upgraded to a Zacks Rank #2 (Buy), reflecting growing optimism about the company's earnings prospects. This might drive the stock higher in the near term.
